text: Has anyone been able to use OAuthLib with bottle?  I can't find anything.  I'm digging in myself, though.
title: Bottle support?

text:
Not what I can recall but can't see why it wouldn't be doable :)

Don't hesitate to draw inspiration from the great work going in @lepture flask-oauthlib and @evonove django-oauth-toolkit. If you end up with a similar extension let me know and I'll add it to the docs.
Hi @ib-lundgren  and @lepture - just curious if you got anywhere with this?  If not, I may spend a bit of time on it.
@nod nope. You can create one for bottle.py.
It seems like this can be closed
